twoSetSkill.name: Binomial Nomenclature 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When host summons an entity, she and the summoned entity are enhanced and Lightning DMG increases by 60.0% for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Enemy presence within 5 meters boosts host's Move Speed by 25%.

threeSetSkill.name: Taxonomy 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Ranged ATKs deal 40.0% bonus Total DMG. For every summoned entity, ELF, or Support Valkyrie present, they and host deal 6.0% bonus Total DMG (5 stacks max).
